summary: Encapsulates a flexible slicing specification for tensors, supporting integer indexing, range slices, array-based selections, and identity (no change). It interprets various input forms and applies them to reduce dimensions or reorder data without adding extra axes.
business_intent: Enable concise, dimension‑preserving slicing operations in tensor‑centric codebases, simplifying custom indexing patterns for deep‑learning models and data preprocessing pipelines.
